Content: The problem of regions is balancement, so every region should have a
drwaback. If in doubt space monsters can be added to make nice regions
less lucrative. In general the map-generator should attempt to generate
the desired galaxy and avoid placing spawns in hopeless areas (so there
may be no-spawn regions, poor-spawn regions, average-spawn regions and
good-spawn regions. (The balancement can than occur in in the
empire-generator, where a region quality is selected, or better bet on
with the highest bidder getting placed in the best approriate spot.))
